action_sequence.automation: AI generates outline from your idea
AI gathers relevant research, examples, data
AI drafts chapters based on outline + research
action_sequence.human_input: Edit AI drafts, add your voice, personal stories

action_sequence.automation: AI edits for grammar, flow, consistency
AI generates cover options based on genre + title
Formats manuscript for Kindle, paperback, hardcover
Guides through ISBN purchase, copyright registration
Auto-fills KDP forms, uploads files, sets pricing
Email launch sequence, social media posts, ads setup
Sends review requests to readers, monitors rankings

what_user_sees.outcome_promise: Write a book and get it published and sitting on Amazon shelves
what_user_sees.modules_included: Book Outlining, AI Writing Assistant, Cover Generator, KDP Integration, etc.

korpak_details_page.activate_korpak_button: Launches guided workflow, tracks progress, automates steps

guided_workflow.step_by_step: User sees current step, knows what's next
guided_workflow.human_decision_points: Pauses for user input/choice when needed
guided_workflow.smart_defaults: Suggests best practices, but user can customize

module_orchestration.sequential_execution: Steps run in order (can't publish before writing)
module_orchestration.parallel_where_possible: Some steps can run simultaneously (research + outline)
module_orchestration.error_handling: If step fails, suggests fixes or alternatives
module_orchestration.checkpoint_saves: Can pause and resume at any step

ai_assistance.context_aware: AI knows what KORPAK you're running, what step you're on
ai_assistance.quality_checks: Reviews outputs at each step (e.g., checks book outline quality)
ai_assistance.optimization: Suggests ways to speed up or improve outcomes

who_can_create.expert_users: Users with 85%+ consciousness can submit KORPAKs
who_can_create.community_vote: Best community KORPAKs get promoted to official

required_fields: Success criteria (how to know it's complete)

korpak_quality_standards.must_be_complete: Takes user from start to finish, not halfway
korpak_quality_standards.must_be_honest: No hype, no guarantees of specific results

starter_tier.access: Unlimited basic + 5 advanced KORPAKs per month

enterprise_licensing.corporations: License KORPAK system for internal use

vs_zapier.difference: Zapier is the plumbing. KORPAK is the entire house.

vs_courses.courses: Teach you HOW to do something (you still have to do it)
vs_courses.korpak: DOES it with you step-by-step (guided execution)
vs_courses.difference: Courses give knowledge. KORPAK gives results.

vs_consultants.difference: Consultants for custom. KORPAK for common missions.
